ValidationRule.description: Validation rule checking the correctness of the PESEL number.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: LEN(Personal_ID_Number__c) <> 11 || NOT(ISNUMBER(Personal_ID_Number__c)) || NOT( OR( AND(VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) >= 1, VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) <= 12), AND(VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) >= 21, VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) <= 32), AND(VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) >= 41, VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) <= 52), AND(VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) >= 61, VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) <= 72), AND(VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) >= 81, VALUE(MID(Personal_ID_Number__c, 3, 2)) <= 92) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Personal Id Number does not meet the requirements of a PESEL number
